Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math

Class Collider

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.math.Collider
public final class Collider
extends java.lang.Object
Provides methods for calculating intersection occurrence and for resolving collisions.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void elasticCollide​(Vector3 origin1, Vector3 velocity1, double mass1, Vector3 origin2, Vector3 velocity2, double mass2)
    Alters the velocities of 2 objects to resemble an elastic collision.
    static Vector3 intersection​(Vector3 origin1, double radius1, Vector3 origin2, double radius2)
    Checks for intersection between 2 spheres.
    static Vector3 intersection​(Vector3 origin1, Vector3 size1, Vector3 origin2, double radius2)
    Checks for intersection between a box and a sphere.
    static Vector3 intersection​(Vector3 origin1, Vector3 size1, Vector3 origin2, Vector3 size2)
    Checks for intersection between 2 boxes.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • intersection

      public static Vector3 intersection​(Vector3 origin1, Vector3 size1, Vector3 origin2, Vector3 size2)
      Checks for intersection between 2 boxes. The returned vector is shared by each intersection method in this class, so it should not be expected to retain its value after subsequent invocations of any intersection method.
      Parameters:
      origin1 - center of first box
      size1 - dimensions of first box
      origin2 - center of second box
      size2 - dimensions of second box
      Returns:
      minimum translation vector to apply to first box to resolve intersection, or null if no intersection

    • intersection

      public static Vector3 intersection​(Vector3 origin1, double radius1, Vector3 origin2, double radius2)
      Checks for intersection between 2 spheres. The returned vector is shared by each intersection method in this class, so it should not be expected to retain its value after subsequent invocations of any intersection method.
      Parameters:
      origin1 - center of 1st sphere
      radius1 - radius of 1st sphere
      origin2 - center of 2nd sphere
      radius2 - radius of 2nd sphere
      Returns:
      minimum translation vector to apply to first sphere to resolve intersection, or null if no intersection

    • intersection

      public static Vector3 intersection​(Vector3 origin1, Vector3 size1, Vector3 origin2, double radius2)
      Checks for intersection between a box and a sphere.
      Parameters:
      origin1 - origin of 1st object (box)
      size1 - size of 1st object (box)
      origin2 - origin of 2nd object (sphere)
      radius2 - radius of 2nd object (sphere)
      Returns:
      minimum translation vector to apply to first object to resolve intersection, or null if no intersection

    • elasticCollide

      public static void elasticCollide​(Vector3 origin1, Vector3 velocity1, double mass1, Vector3 origin2, Vector3 velocity2, double mass2)
      Alters the velocities of 2 objects to resemble an elastic collision.
      Parameters:
      origin1 - center of 1st object
      velocity1 - velocity of 1st object
      mass1 - mass of 1st object
      origin2 - center of 2nd object
      velocity2 - velocity of 2nd object
      mass2 - mass of 2nd object
